sentences.en: "Anyhow," she added briskly, "it's none of my business."
sentences.cn: “不管怎样”，她轻松地补充说，“这不关我的事。”

sentences.en: "None of them are very nice folks." — "Tell me more."
sentences.cn: “他们都不是好人.”——“说具体点.”

sentences.en: Although these were good students, none had a score above 60.
sentences.cn: 虽然这些都是好学生，但是没有一个考到60分以上。

sentences.en: Even an old car is better than none.
sentences.cn: 有一辆旧车也比没有车强。

sentences.en: He was none too thrilled to hear from me at that hour.
sentences.cn: 在那个钟点接到我的电话，他一点也兴奋不起来。

sentences.en: her first customer was none other than Henry du Pont.
sentences.cn: 她的第一位顾客正是亨利•杜邦。

sentences.en: her first customer was none other than Henry du Pont.
sentences.cn: 她的第一位顾客正是亨利•杜邦。

sentences.en: her first customer was none other than Henry du Pont.
sentences.cn: 她的第一位顾客正是亨利•杜邦。

sentences.en: her first customer was none other than Henry du Pont.
sentences.cn: 她的第一位顾客正是亨利•杜邦。

sentences.en: I don't think they'll have any idea how I'm feeling. None whatsoever.
sentences.cn: 我认为他们并不了解我的感受，一点儿都不了解。

sentences.en: I turned to bookshops and libraries seeking information and found none.
sentences.cn: 我去了书店和图书馆查找资料，但什么也没找到。

sentences.en: I was none too pleased to have to take the exam again.
sentences.cn: 我要重考一次，根本高兴不起来。

sentences.en: I will have none of it.
sentences.cn: 我不会接受那一套的。

sentences.en: I wish I could offer you some cake but there’s none left.
sentences.cn: 我真想能请你吃些蛋糕，但一点也没剩的了。

sentences.en: Marianne was none too pleased to find Simon seated beside her.
sentences.cn: 玛丽安娜发现西蒙坐在自己旁边很不高兴。

sentences.en: None but God will ever know what I suffered.
sentences.cn: 只有上帝知道我受过什么苦。

sentences.en: None of my business, I guess. It's your funeral.
sentences.cn: 我想是不关我什么事儿，你就自寻死路吧。

sentences.en: None of that matters, because we're crazy about each other.
sentences.cn: 那些都不重要，因为我们深深地爱着对方。

sentences.en: None of these minus points will have been mentioned.
sentences.cn: 这些不利因素都不会被提及。

sentences.en: None of these people will admit responsibility for their actions.
sentences.cn: 这些人都不会愿意为自己的行为负责。

sentences.en: She displays none of the sanctimoniousness often associated with spirituality.
sentences.cn: 在她身上丝毫未见圣职人员常有的那种故作虔诚。

sentences.en: She exhibited none of the narcissistic and nihilistic tendencies of her peers.
sentences.cn: 她一点儿都没表现出同龄人那种自恋和虚无主义的性格倾向。

sentences.en: She waited for a reply, but none came.
sentences.cn: 她等着答复，可是什么也没等到。

sentences.en: That's none of your business, it has nothing to do with you.
sentences.cn: 那不关你的事，与你八竿子打不着。

sentences.en: The leggy beauty was none other than our own Naomi Campbell.
sentences.cn: 这位长腿美女不是别人，正是咱们的娜奥米·坎贝尔。

phrases.phrase: will have (或 want) none of something

trans.tran_en: not having any more understanding or knowledge about something than you had before
not any amount of something or not one of a group of people or things
